power.title: Charm of Protection
power.fluff: The instant before a blow connects, your spell interposes a spectral object in its path

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the attack.
If the attack still hits you, you reduce the damage by 2 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: By 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: By 8 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Daunting Presence
power.fluff: Shadows deepen around you, your voice deepens to a rumbe, and you appear to grow larger as you confront those foolish enough to dispute your wishes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain the following benefits:
► You are considered trained in the Intimidate skill. If you are already trained, you instead gain a +2 power bonus to checks with it.
► Creatures adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to all attack rolls with attacks that target you.

power.title: Expeditious Retreat
power.fluff: Your form blurs as you hastily withdraw from the battlefield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to twice your speed.
If you are slowed, you can still shift up to 5 squares.

power.title: Familiar Harrier
power.fluff: You send your familiar in to keep your opponent off balance

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the Arcane Familiar feat, or have a familiar from some other source

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: Your familiar must be active

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport your familiar 10 squares.
Until the end of your next turn, your familiar can flank with you or your allies. When an attack hits a creature flanked by the familiar, that creature cannot shift until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Feather Fall
power.fluff: You or a creature you choose falls gently, like a feather

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You fall, or a creature within 10 squares of you falls

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes no damage from the fall, and consequently does not fall prone at the end of it.

power.title: Flare
power.fluff: Multicolored sparks, sizzles, and sparks erupt from a seed of fire you throw and prodive a momentary distraction

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Perception checks until the end of its next turn. A creature that does not use sight is immune to this effect.
The burst creates a zone of multicolored sparks until the end of your next turn.
Attacks within or through the zone treat the target as having partial concealment. A creature that does not use sight is immune to this effect.

power.title: Float
power.fluff: You rise a few inches above the ground and glide over minor hindrances

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You hover 6 inches above the ground until the end of the encounter or until you fall. You can float over only a solid surface or liquir surface directly beneath you. For example, you cannot use this power to cross a chasm or pit; if you try to do so, you fall normally.

While floating, you ignore movement penalties and restrictions due to terrain, do not set off pressure-sensitive traps, and cannot be detected with tremorsense. You also gain a +2 power bonus to Stealth checks.

power.title: Glib Tongue
power.fluff: You weave magic into your words, defusing a dangerous situation through the fine art of diplomacy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain the following benefits:
► You gain a +2 power bonus to Diplomacy checks, and Bluff checks.
► You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls with powers that have the Charm keyword.

power.title: Guardian Blades
power.fluff: Three spectral blades appear around you, floating in a ring that wards away your foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure spectral blades in your space until the end of the encounter or until you become unconscious. The blades move with you, remaining in your space.

While the blades remain, any enemy adjacent to you that makes an attack takes force damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. No enemy can take this damage more than once per turn.

power.title: Herbal Healing
power.fluff: Using a mix of herbal lore and witchcraft, you work a spell that binds some wounds

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in the Heal skill.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can make a saving throw. The target can then use his or her second wind as a free reaction.

power.title: Jump
power.fluff: You or another creature you choose can suddenly leap great distances

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes an Athletics check to jump, with a +5 power bonus on the check. He or she is considered to have a running start and can move as far as the check allows.

power.title: Lifetaker
power.fluff: You crook your finger and snatch a soul as it struggles free from its body - it screams as you draw forth its energy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A nonminion living creature drops to 0 hit points or less within 5 squares of you

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering creature dies.
The target either gains temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, or regains one healing surge, target's choice.

power.title: Memory to Mist
power.fluff: Your magic settles into a creature's mind, causing it to forget what it just witnessed

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must use this power outside of combat.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target forgets everything that happened in the past 10 minutes and for the next 1 minute.

power.title: Mystical Debris
power.fluff: You transmute an area to make it harder to move through

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The area becomes difficult terrain until the end of the encounter. While at least one square is affected, you can use the following action:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: You end the effect on one or more squares of your choice.

section.name: Special:
section.text: The maximum number of squares you can have under this effect is equal to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Phantasmal Terrain
power.fluff: You make already treacherous terrain even more difficult for your enemies to traverse

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of obfuscated terrain until the end of the encounter.
Difficult terrain in the zone costs two additional squares of movement for your enemies instead of 1 additional square.

Additionally, hazards and traps in the zone gain a bonus to attack rolls against your enemies equal to your implement's enhancement bonus, and deal additional damage against your enemies equal to your Charisma modifier.
Finally, enemies have a -2 penalty to saving throws to avoid being forcibly moved into hazardous terrain in the zone.

power.title: Protection from Missiles
power.fluff: A wave of your hand calls forth a protective wind to disperse arrows and other missiles headed your way

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone protective winds that lasts until the end of the encounter.

While in the zone, you and your allies have a +4 power bonus to all defenses against ranged attacks with the Weapon keyword, and a +2 power bonus to all defenses against area attacks with the Weapon keyword.

power.title: Shield
power.fluff: You throw up your hand, and a shield of arcane energy springs into existence, protecting you against imminent attacks

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.
